book.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
book.author: Harper Lee
book.description: A classic novel set in the American South during the 1930s. It addresses issues of racial injustice and moral growth.

book.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
book.author: Yuval Noah Harari
book.description: An exploration of the history of Homo sapiens, from ancient times to the present, covering significant events that shaped human evolution.

book.title: Introduction to Algorithms
book.author: Thomas H. Cormen, Charles E. Leiserson, Ronald L. Rivest, and Clifford Stein
book.description: A comprehensive guide to algorithms, their design, analysis, and implementation, widely used as a textbook in computer science courses.

book.title: The Art of Happiness
book.author: Dalai Lama and Howard Cutler
book.description: An exploration of the concepts of happiness, fulfillment, and the practices that lead to a meaningful and joyful life, blending Eastern philosophy and Western psychology.
